product_name: White Sierra Whitney Springs Fleece Hoodie - Youth Boys' - Special Buy
long_description: With an attached hood and color-popped stitching, this fleece hoodie delivers a comfortable fit and plenty of personality and warmth for the bus stop, classroom and after-school activities.
